list.alreadyExistsUncomplete: Already exists. Do you want to uncomplete it?
list.similarTasksExist: There are a few similar tasks here: {{taskNames}}. Do you still want to add this task?
list.archivedList:
This list is archived.
Do you want to restore it?

editList.inOrderToChangeThisList: In order to change this list you must be an owner or Administrator.
editList.eachRow: Each row will be a new task

shareList.userDoesntExist: No user with that email exists.
shareList.cannotShareWithUser: This user has blocked a share request from you previously. You cannot share with them until they unblock you.

archiveList.archivingAList: Archiving a list will hide it from your home page and disable notifications for it. It is a way for you to tidy up your home page by hiding lists that you currently aren't using. To open or restore archived lists go to the Menu page and click the "Archived lists" button.
archiveList.archivingAListShared: Archiving a list will hide it from your home page and disable notifications for it. This will not affect any of the users that share the list, it is only a way for you to tidy up your home page by hiding lists that you currently aren't using. To open or restore archived lists go to the Menu page and click the "Archived lists" button.

uncompleteTasks.thisWillUncomplete: This will uncomplete all tasks in this list.
uncompleteTasks.thisWillUncompleteShared: This will uncomplete all public and your own private tasks in this list. The private tasks of users that may be sharing the list will not be affected.

bulkAddTasks.eachRow: Each row will be a new task

editTask.taskUsedAsIngredientInRecipes: This task is used as an ingredient in the following recipes in Cooking Assistant:
editTask.deletingItWillUnlinkIt: Deleting it will unlink it from Cooking Assistant.

shareRequests.emptyListMessage: There are no new share requests

preferences.notificationsPermission: You must first give notifications permission to the app.
preferences.notificationsUnpermitted: Notifications are currently unpermitted. Please permit Notifications for To Do Assistant in your browser first.

tooltips.tooltipWillNoLongerShow: This tooltip will no longer show. If you wish to retain it, go to the Menu page and click the "Help" button.

oneTimeTasks.title: Delete tasks on completion
oneTimeTasks.question: What is this?
oneTimeTasks.answer: When checked, the tasks in this list will by default be deleted when set to done instead of moved below.

memberVsAdmin.title: List member VS admin
memberVsAdmin.question: What is the difference?
memberVsAdmin.answer: Members can only change tasks whereas Adminis can change the list itself as well as share it with other users.

shareRequests.title: Share requests
shareRequests.question: What is this?
shareRequests.answer: Someone wants to share a list with you. Shared lists are a way for multiple users to collaborate. If you decline a share request the user that made it will not be able to further share any more with you.

privateTasks.title: Private tasks
privateTasks.question: What is this?
privateTasks.answer: Private tasks allow you to keep track of personal matters in a shared list. Other users in the shared list cannot see them.
